sink.preCopyScript: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_basics') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_basics
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'name_basics') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.name_basics
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_akas') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_akas
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_crew') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_crew
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_episode') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_episode
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_ratings') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_ratings
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'title_principals') TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.title_principals
